system.description: Rogues are cunning opportunists who strike when their enemies least expect it. Their sneak attacks and luck manipulation make them deadly midline strikers who excel at exploiting weaknesses.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: You gain the Jack of All Trades Perk. Choose two Skills you are Trained in; you have Favor on Checks with those Skills.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Once per Turn, when you hit a Target with an attack and have Favor on the attack roll, or an Enemy of the Target is within 5 feet of it, you deal an extra Cd6 damage. This damage increases by 1d6 at 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th Levels in this Class.

features.name: Cunning Action
features.description: You can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide Action as a Move, rather than an Action.

features.name: Uncanny Dodge
features.description: When an attack hits you, you can use your Reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.

features.name: Evasion
features.description: When you pass a Reflex Save, you take no damage instead of half damage.

features.name: Reliable Talent
features.description: When you make a Check with a Skill you are Trained in and roll lower than 10 on the d20, you can treat the roll as a 10.

features.name: Stroke of Luck
features.description: Once per Rest, if you miss with an attack, you can turn the miss into a hit.
